summary: A traumatized boy grows into a shy, determined teenager who patrols the mean streets of New York City, helping those in need and dishing out severe punishment to remorseless thugs.
cast: Caleb Steinmeyer|Zulay Henao|Bill Sage|Daniel Stewart Sherman|Tracy Middendorf|Chuck Cooper|John Sharian|Kether Donohue|James Russo|Jake Randazzo|Robbie Stubbs|Chris Bert|Nicole Patrick|Alex Manette|Tom Brangle|Suzanne DiDonna|Milena Davila|Herman Chavez|Isaiah Stokes|Phillip Whitney|Esther David|Kiah Fredricks|Angel Garcia|James Chen|Jeremy Bobb|Wendy Familia|Romeo Ballantine|Alexandra Zabriskie|Julian Joseph|Jay Yee|Felice Choi|James Devoti|James Morrissey|Kiai Kim|Aja Maria Johnson|Alestair Shu|Richard Marshall|Rebecca Kush|Leo Kin|Roberta Wallach|Dante Bacote|Karl Michael|Monte Bezell|David Barret|Michael Diaz|Alexa Morrissey|Samantha Scaccia|Victoria Carolina|Brianna Calveri|Makayla Sonnenburg|Macy Medema|Bailey Calveri|John John Scaccia|Joey Formantes|Greg Ardon|Joe Thompson|Kevin Aquinas|Carlos Ortiz|Glenn Vukov|Tony Savvas|Billy Cullen|Gerry Linnane|Massiel Hernandez|Victor Arnez|Chaka Desilva|Marty Garcia|Philip Greene|Leslie C. title: Boy Wonder
